metadata.title: CVE-2017-12583 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
DokuWiki through 2017-02-19b has XSS in the at parameter (aka the DATE_AT variable) to doku.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-12583` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dokuwiki - 0.0.20180422.a-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.20180422.a-2').
